arts.ttl: Full Leicester City squad for Nottingham Forest as Steve Cooper suffers 'setback'
arts.sum: Jannik Vestergaard’s “setback” will keep him out for a couple of weeks, Leicester City manager Steve Cooper has suggested. The central defender, who has not played for the club since August, had a recurrence of his ankle injury after he returned from Denmark duty last week.

arts.ttl: Nuno Espirito Santo says £5m player has been doing 'fantastically well' for Nottingham Forest
arts.sum: Nottingham Forest moved into the top ten of the Premier League table thanks to their 1-0 win over Crystal Palace on Monday night. The Reds...

arts.ttl: The FA's decision on Mohammed Kudus won't please Nottingham Forest - opinion
